sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the curative effect and safety of dibutyl phthalate on demodicidosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察滅蚴寧治療蠕形蟎病的效果及安全性。

sentences.english: Aim The oral drops of dermatophagoides farinae for the inhibition of allergy was studied.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討粉塵蟎口服滴劑的抗過敏作用特點。

sentences.english: In chigger mite communities, Leototrombidium orientale are dominant species for all hosts.
sentences.chinese: 恙蟎羣落中，東方纖恙蟎爲不同鼠種的優勢種。

sentences.english: In chigger mite communities, Leototrombidium orientale are dominant species for all hosts.
sentences.chinese: 恙蟎羣落中，東方纖恙蟎爲不同鼠種的優勢種。

sentences.english: The niche breadth of the 6 dominant chigger species is different with a wide niche overlap.
sentences.chinese: 優勢恙蟎的生態位寬度差異與生態位重疊均明顯。

sentences.english: The results of the detection could meet the requirement of the national standard for testing the dicofol residue in foods.
sentences.chinese: 該方法可以滿足檢測食品中三氯殺蟎醇殘留的需要。

sentences.english: It was found that Cirrospilus pictus Nee can parasitize in cecidium of Aceria pallida Keifer for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 首次發現普通瑟姬小蜂可寄生於枸杞癭蟎蟲癭內。

sentences.english: Sichuan Grain Storage Institute, Ministry of commerce The stored product mites is one of the three breaches in acarology.
sentences.chinese: 儲藏物蟎類是蜱蟎學三大分枝學科之一。

sentences.english: Dermatophagoides farinae is one of the main pathogenic mites causing human acariasis.
sentences.chinese: 粉塵蟎是人體蟎病的主要病原蟎之一。

sentences.english: Dermatophagoides farinae is one of the main pathogenic mites causing human acariasis.
sentences.chinese: 粉塵蟎是人體蟎病的主要病原蟎之一。

sentences.english: Dermatophagoides farinae is one of the main pathogenic mites causing human acariasis.
sentences.chinese: 粉塵蟎是人體蟎病的主要病原蟎之一。

sentences.english: There are 15 species of ticks and 46 species of medical mites in this area.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明河北省蜱類有15種，醫學蟎類有46種。

sentences.english: A total 6 species of chigger mites were collected from 5 species of rodents and insectivores.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，當地5種小獸類體外共有6種寄生恙蟎。

sentences.english: Cats, foxes, and humans all have their own particular species of mite within the Sarcoptes family.
sentences.chinese: 貓，狐狸，而人類都有自己的特定物種蟎在疥家庭。

sentences.english: In recent years, honeybees have been hit by the varroa mite, which has spread here from Asia.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，蜜蜂經常受到來自亞洲的大蜂蟎的迫害。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of oleum eucalypti in killing Demodex in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察桉葉油的體外殺蟎效果。

definition: imago (adult, sexually mature insect, the final stage of its development)
a kind of dog with a long snout/see 獫狁|猃狁[Xian3 yun3]
aerosol/spray/mist/splattered drops/spray from sneeze or saliva
milligram (old)/single-character equivalent of 毫克[hao2 ke4]
